Title: Relates to establishing a crisis intervention team program
Summary: Relates to establishing a crisis intervention demonstration program.
LawCode: Add §§7.51, 7.53 & 7.55, amd §19.07, Ment Hyg L; add §99-ss, St Fin L; add §209-ii, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, the state finance law and the general municipal law, in relation to establishing a crisis intervention team program; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
